title: Namida Afureru Kandouai
sinopse:
A short story collection about teary, touchy stories from various mangaka.

1. Room 1/4: Naranai Denwa [Shimotsuki Kayoko]
2. Oneichan to Issho♥: Minori to Kotaro [Minato Suzu]
3. Kagerou Inazuma Mizu no Tsuki: Mizu no Tsuki [Ame Arare]
4. My Little Boyfriend [Nekoyama Miyao]
5. Curtain-goshi no Kare [Kimura Ayako]
